results.title: Long-acting PGE2 and Lisinopril Mitigate H-ARS.
results.text_hl: After 7.75 Gy @<m>DISEASE_Sialadenitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012793 @@@TBI@@@, dmPGE2 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ each increased survival relative to vehicle controls.

citations.NLM: Saunders J, Niswander LM, McGrath KE, Koniski A, Catherman SC, Ture SK, Medhora M, Kingsley PD, Calvi LM, Williams JP, Morrell CN, Palis J. Long-acting PGE2 and Lisinopril Mitigate H-ARS. Radiat Res. 2021 Sep 1;196(3):284-296. PMID: 34153091
citations.BibTeX: @article{34153091, title={Long-acting PGE2 and Lisinopril Mitigate H-ARS.}, author={Saunders J and Niswander LM and McGrath KE and Koniski A and Catherman SC and Ture SK and Medhora M and Kingsley PD and Calvi LM and Williams JP and Morrell CN and Palis J}, journal={Radiat Res}, volume={196}, number={3}, pages={284-296}}

results.title: Optical Metabolic Imaging for Assessment of Radiation-Induced Injury to Rat Kidney and Mitigation by Lisinopril.
results.text_hl: In addition, the results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ mitigates @<m>DISEASE_Sialadenitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012793 @@@irradiation damage@@@ by attenuating the oxidation of mitochondria leading to increase redox ratio.

citations.NLM: Mehrvar S, la Cour MF, Medhora M, Camara AKS, Ranji M. Optical Metabolic Imaging for Assessment of Radiation-Induced Injury to Rat Kidney and Mitigation by Lisinopril. Ann Biomed Eng. 2019 Jul;47(7):1564-1574. PMID: 30963380
citations.BibTeX: @article{30963380, title={Optical Metabolic Imaging for Assessment of Radiation-Induced Injury to Rat Kidney and Mitigation by Lisinopril.}, author={Mehrvar S and la Cour MF and Medhora M and Camara AKS and Ranji M}, journal={Ann Biomed Eng}, volume={47}, number={7}, pages={1564-1574}}
